overview: Let your imagination run wild as you join Little Bear and his friends in the fanciful adventures of "DREAMS & MAKE BELIEVE." Look out as Father Bear turns into a pudding-eating monster, run as quick as you can to catch the gingerbread men, or battle a bout of the bedbug litters. Whatever the adventure, Little Bear learn that imagination is the stuff that dreams are made of.
title: Little Bear - Dreams & Make Believe
